mutants.code:
import re

def extract_font_styles(html):
    pattern = ''
    font_styles = set()
    html = re.sub('<!--.*?-->', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<script.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<style.*?</style>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    matches = re.findall(pattern, html, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in matches:
        font_style = re.sub('<|>', '', match).lower()
        font_styles.add(font_style)
    return font_styles

import re

def extract_font_styles(html):
    pattern = '<(b|i|u|s|strong|em|ins|del)[^>]*?>'
    font_styles = set()
    html = re.sub('', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<script.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<style.*?</style>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    matches = re.findall(pattern, html, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in matches:
        font_style = re.sub('<|>', '', match).lower()
        font_styles.add(font_style)
    return font_styles

import re

def extract_font_styles(html):
    pattern = '<(b|i|u|s|strong|em|ins|del)[^>]*?>'
    font_styles = set()
    html = re.sub('<!--.*?-->', 'MUTATED', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<script.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<style.*?</style>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    matches = re.findall(pattern, html, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in matches:
        font_style = re.sub('<|>', '', match).lower()
        font_styles.add(font_style)
    return font_styles

import re

def extract_font_styles(html):
    pattern = '<(b|i|u|s|strong|em|ins|del)[^>]*?>'
    font_styles = set()
    html = re.sub('<!--.*?-->', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<script.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<style.*?</style>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)

        font_styles.add(font_style)
    return font_styles

import re

def extract_font_styles(html):
    pattern = '<(b|i|u|s|strong|em|ins|del)[^>]*?>'
    font_styles = set()
    html = re.sub('<!--.*?-->', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<script.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<style.*?</style>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    matches = re.findall(pattern, html, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in matches:
        font_style = re.sub('<|>', 'MUTATED', match).lower()
        font_styles.add(font_style)
    return font_styles
